block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: LED ON LED when push button pressed
- = 1 - - 0 click on Green flag to run this - traffic light will run in normal sequence - when "button pressed" = 1 - say "Pedestrain Crossing" - and reset "button pressed" to 0
- = 1 - - 0 click on Green flag to run this - when "button pressed" = 1 - say "Button PRESSED!" - and reset "button pressed" to 0
- = 1 click on Green flag to run this - when button is press, variable "button pressed" = 1
